name: Petal Fear Molid
description:
This is my first game- a demake of one of my all time favorites. Can you grab the flashlight, sneak past the guards to find the secret code?!

WSAD keys to move.

NOTES

There is no sound.

For some reason, the first time does not bring up the guards on the mini map, which makes the game easier. stopping and starting again should fix it.
